definition: person who shares their experiences and thoughts with others on the Internet

(of the sun) to shine on/to bask in (the sunshine)/to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun/(fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share")/(coll.) to give the cold shoulder to
to post (an item on a forum)
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])

(of the sun) to shine on/to bask in (the sunshine)/to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun/(fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share")/(coll.) to give the cold shoulder to
to share (let others have some of sth good)
citizen journalist (typically posting short, self-produced documentary videos on the Web)
to follow each other's accounts (on Weibo etc)
to exercise/to keep fit/to work out/physical exercise
